sources.title: AUSTRAC accepts enforceable undertaking from National Australia Bank
sources.snippet: AUSTRAC has accepted an enforceable undertaking from National Australia Bank (NAB) to uplift its compliance with Australia's anti-money laundering and counter-terrorism financing (AML/CTF) laws. The action follows an AUSTRAC enforcement investigation which identified concerns about NAB's AML/CTF program, systems and controls.
